original_title: Colombo District final results: NPP secures 14 seats, SJB wins 4
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Colombo District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 68% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 788,636 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 208,249 votes (18.12%).
The NPP has secured 14 seats in the district while the SJB has won 4 seats in the district.
